Speech Transcript Manitowoc, Wisconsin September 21
Joe Biden spoke during a campaign visit to Manitowoc, Wisconsin on
September 21. Biden focused on Donald Trump’s coronavirus response, saying
the virus was “too big” for Trump. Transcript of his remarks here.

Anyone from… as they say in part of my city, your family done good. Long,
